descriptions.about-description:
At this time I'm a Systems Engineering student
at Wroclaw University of Technology and Science.

I am eager to learn new things, especially when it is about programming.
My Web Development skills are basic - Basics of JS, CSS and HTML.
I also possess basics of Python and Oracle SQL which I am currently developing.

My greatest goal is to get an opportunity to expand my knowledge by working with a team and recieve feedback from my progress.
